item.title: U.S. Suspends Visas for Palestinian Passport Holders, Officials Say
item.description: The move will stop, at least temporarily, travel for medical treatment, attending university, visiting relatives or conducting business.

item.title: Behind Thai Premier’s Dismissal, Unraveling of an Uneasy Alliance
item.description: Thaksin Shinawatra had struck a grand bargain with Thailand’s establishment, analysts say, that allowed his daughter to ascend to the prime minister’s...

item.title: Brazil Tightens Bolsonaro House Arrest Amid Escape Concerns
item.description: Former President Jair Bolsonaro, who will stand trial on Tuesday, is being closely monitored by the Brazilian authorities, who fear he may try to flee...

item.title: Judge Halts U.S. Effort to Deport Guatemalan Children as Planes Sit on Tarmac
item.description: The temporary block ended another last-minute flurry of legal action over the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.

item.title: China Shows Off Its Power
item.description: Xi Jinping is using a summit with leaders like Narendra Modi and Vladimir Putin as an opportunity to pull countries away from the U.S.
